flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

lines.text: First, cut a small piece of tape to protect the thumb.
lines.text_raw: First, cut a small piece of tape to protect the thumb.

lines.text: Then cut a second piece to build the strap of the thumb protector.
lines.text_raw: Then cut a second piece to build the strap of the thumb protector.

lines.text: Make sure that the parts in contact with the baby are protected with tape and that no adhesive is exposed.
lines.text_raw: Make sure that the parts in contact with the baby are protected with tape and that no adhesive is exposed.

lines.text: Put the thumb protector on the baby's hand as soon as they fall asleep.
lines.text_raw: Put the thumb protector on the baby's hand as soon as they fall asleep.

lines.text: The thumb has to be completely enveloped by the guard.
lines.text_raw: The thumb has to be completely enveloped by the guard.

lines.text: Staple the tape to adjust the size of the strap to fit the baby's hand. Be careful to leave no metal protrusion that could hurt the baby!
lines.text_raw: Staple the tape to adjust the size of the strap to fit the baby's hand. Be careful to leave no metal protrusion that could hurt the baby!

guide.summary: Help your children to leave the thumb-sucking habit.
guide.title: Thumb Sucker Guard
